verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.
2 "JESUS_END"(For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-3/" title="2 Corinthians 6:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:
4 "JESUS_END"But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-5/" title="2 Corinthians 6:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-6/" title="2 Corinthians 6:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-7/" title="2 Corinthians 6:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,
8 "JESUS_END"By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;
9 "JESUS_END"As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;
10 "JESUS_END"As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
11 "JESUS_END"O ye Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-12/" title="2 Corinthians 6:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.
13 "JESUS_END"Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto my children,) be ye also enlarged.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-14/" title="2 Corinthians 6:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-15/" title="2 Corinthians 6:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?

16 "JESUS_END"And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
17 "JESUS_END"Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-18/" title="2 Corinthians 6:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
